body_html:
I list some problem which may be fixed:

  1. slim.learning.train may need to add parameter wait_for_checkpoint, otherwise the parameter wait_for_checkpoint of SessionManager's prepare_session is always False.
body_text:
I list some problem which may be fixed:

slim.learning.train may need to add parameter wait_for_checkpoint, otherwise the parameter wait_for_checkpoint of SessionManager's prepare_session is always False.
body:
I list some problem which may be fixed:
1.  slim.learning.train may need to add parameter `wait_for_checkpoint`, otherwise the parameter `wait_for_checkpoint` of `SessionManager`'s prepare_session is always `False`.
